TopicTitle: What feature (or part/s) are you most excited and hyped for in 1.0?

Articles.Content:
Hello, forums!

Recently, KSP version 1.0 has gone to Experimentals, and the planned stuff for it is quite.. Mind-blowing.

So which of the features that was mentioned and officially said to be part are you most anticipating and excited for?

For me, I think it would be the Fairings, and new landing gear, as they've been long wanted in stock for a long time, and could change KSP engineering, not only in the replica side of things, but in general craft-making as well.

What about you guys?
Memory leaks fixed and hopefully some DX11 fixes. Everything else has a mod already, so no big deal.
Bug fixes.

To echo what Yukon0009 said; 

Bug fixes Bug fixes Bug fixes Bug fixes

Performance improvements and aero. I don't need the performance improvements myself but I know a lot of people struggle for decent performance when MOAR BOOSTERS are applied. Aero specifically for lifting bodies hopefully.

Tweety

Aerodynamics and usable DX11 - never really suffered from memory leaks and I'm doubtful physics will be enhanced (not a dig at the devs).

Will also be great to have female kerbals and re-entry heating stock. 

Oh, and resources. That's great.

Wow. Everything.

proper structural welding

oh wait, no, thats not happening.
Please make it more efficient, my poor PC can only do so much ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Big Fixes and Optimization. Though whether all these new features will ruin that remains to be seen... :\
Aero/fairings, i really want to see how they work
The small little features I like that add to the immersion.

I wonder what bugs Squad will fix..

I hope compatibility with Macs are improved as well.
resources and aero

Will "Craters" biomes on Duna be fixed for 1.0? They really really suck as is. Right now "Craters" is the border between highlands and icecap, instead of actually the craters

![craters_zps7f7ad4ad.jpg](http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp38/FoxMouldy/craters_zps7f7ad4ad.jpg)

Dead bugs

Proper aerodynamics

Re-entry heat

Fairings

Kerbal clamber

Delta v readout (KSP 1.0 without it is unacceptable)

...

A decent tech tree, but I'm keeping my hopes low on this one.

OS X Yosemite compatibility. I haven't really played KSP for weeks, because the game crashes way too often in Yosemite.

I don't count lack of bugginess as a feature.

Improved aerodynamic model. (With reentry heat.)

Balanced fuel drain from all tanks in a stage. (This changes everything for plane/spaceplane design.)

Happy landings!

Bug Fixes

Optimizations

Better Aero

Cam-Shake

Fairings

Re-entry Heat

Kerbal Climbing thing

Proper aerodynamics + Fairings

Re-entry heat + Heatshields

Basically, having the atmosphere doing "atmosphere stuff" and the amazing rocket design and gameplay changes that this will suppose.
Polishing of gameplay and making it a rounded complete experience. Am I expecting too much?
Less crashes. Please. I beg you. I can deal with everything else There is always a mod for it...

The new heat system is sounding awesome. Also tons of bug fixes.

Oh yeah, and the texture loading. Wait, that isn't confirmed... Oh well, I'm on x64 Linux, the rest of you people stuck with 32-bit memory limits can suffer.

Bug fixes

Optimization

Moddability (eg of building upgrades)

Kerbal climbing
gp2 if it is being released in this version

Fairings, aero overhaul, less ram leaks, bug fixes and reentry heat.(I haven't heard a lot of people looking forward to that one)

I would love to see all of the parts (Especially the fuel tanks) updated to the level of the mk2 and mk3 parts.(Yes I know there's a mod for that, I use it)
